title: 14 day suspended to perm banned off same game?
body:
So I was 14 Day suspended on 01-06-2017, to then check my account on 15-06-2017 for it to be permanently banned. The chat logs which were provided in both 'bans' are exactly the same and only from one game? 
How can I go from one suspension to the next level in a matter of one game (the same game which got me 14 day suspended).

How do I appeal this?

replies.body: I got this recently, as well. 25 game chat restriction into a 14 day ban for the same game. I was punished twice.

Usually what happens with cases like this is you have played two games that were punishment worthy, but got into the second before the punishment for the first was issued, the result being the 14 day ban, then the perma ban applied immediately after for the second game you played.

I'd recommend submitting a ticket to support since they can likely explain what happened better.
